document.full_text: a 22-nation survey released on tuesday found three-quarters of those polled believed the united states was justified in killing al qaeda leader osama bin laden for his role in the september 11, 2001, attacks.
document.title: global support for u.s. killing of bin laden: poll
lines_and_colors: a 22-nation survey released on tuesday found three-quarters of those polled believed the united states was justified in killing al qaeda leader osama bin laden for his role in the september 11, 2001, attacks.
